amendment.description: An amendment numbered 83 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funds to implement or enforce the CFPB's rule entitled "Small Business Lending Under the Equal Credit Opportunity Act.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
